typeSystemDescription.name: TypeSystemLLM
typeSystemDescription.description: Types for processing LLMs (Large Language Model)

typeDescription.name: org.texttechnologylab.type.LLMSystemPrompt
typeDescription.description: System Prompt for LLM, it is optional, if not set, already System Prompt in the LLM will be used or No System Prompt will be used

typeDescription.name: org.texttechnologylab.type.LLMPrefixPrompt
typeDescription.description: Prefix Prompt for LLM. It is optional, if not set, will be placed before the user Prompt. For example adding additional information to the Prompt.

featureDescription.name: message
featureDescription.description: Prefix before the Prompt for LLM

typeDescription.name: org.texttechnologylab.type.LLMSuffixPrompt
typeDescription.description: Suffix Prompt for LLM. It is optional, if not set, will be placed after the user Prompt. For example adding additional information to the Prompt.

featureDescription.name: message
featureDescription.description: Suffix after the Prompt for LLM

typeDescription.name: org.texttechnologylab.type.LLMPrompt
typeDescription.description: Prompt for LLM with the input text. The user Prompt is mandatory, if not set, the LLM will not be called.

featureDescription.name: suffix
featureDescription.description: Suffix after the Prompt for the LLM

typeDescription.name: org.texttechnologylab.type.LLMResult
typeDescription.description: Result of LLM with the reference to the corresponding prompt.

featureDescription.name: result
featureDescription.description: Result in a json-String Format of LLM

featureDescription.name: content
featureDescription.description: Content of result as string extracted from the result.
